portfolio.title: Success Stories
portfolio.subtitle: Each project is unique and designed to solve specific challenges. Here are some examples of our work.

dos-x-dos-grupo-imagen.title: Dos x Dos Grupo Imagen
dos-x-dos-grupo-imagen.intro: We transformed a scattered business ecosystem into an integrated digital platform, connecting CRM, ERP and web through intelligent automations to boost operational efficiency and commercial visibility.
dos-x-dos-grupo-imagen.challenge: Scattered manual processes, unintegrated ERP, no CRM and static website limiting operational efficiency and commercial visibility.
dos-x-dos-grupo-imagen.solution: We implemented Zoho CRM, migrated to A3 ERP, created Notion integration and developed new optimized website with Next.js.
dos-x-dos-grupo-imagen.result: Agile customer service, smooth internal processes, content autonomy and immediate jump in organic visibility.

situation.title: A scattered digital landscape held back their growth
situation.description: Dos x Dos started from a dispersed landscape — manual processes, an unintegrated ERP (Navision), absence of CRM and a static website that didn't reflect the brand's sophistication or help position it in search engines.

approach.title: We orchestrated a complete digital transformation
approach.description: To reverse this, we implemented Zoho CRM, migrated to A3 ERP and connected them to a Notion space that orchestrates projects and automations; all integrated through a unified API.

impact.title: The transformation delivered immediate and lasting results
impact.description: The result: agile customer service, more fluid internal processes, autonomy to publish content, immediate jump in organic visibility and a data ecosystem prepared for the next challenge.

issues.noCrm: No CRM system for customer management
issues.staticWebsite: Static website with poor SEO performance

processes.erpMigration: Migration from Navision to A3 ERP
processes.websiteDevelopment: New Next.js website with custom CMS

energia-solar-canarias.title: Energía Solar Canarias
energia-solar-canarias.intro: We unified multiple scattered energy tools into a progressive web platform with integrated CRM, enabling real-time monitoring and process automation to optimize savings and reduce carbon footprint.
energia-solar-canarias.challenge: Multiple unconnected tools, lack of unified platform and absence of CRM to organize users and alerts.
energia-solar-canarias.solution: We developed unified progressive web application and CRM connected to ERP with dashboards and automatic synchronization.
energia-solar-canarias.result: Real-time monitoring, personalized alerts, reduced manual work and improved energy efficiency.

situation.title: Fragmented tools created operational chaos
situation.description: Energía Solar Canarias started from multiple unconnected tools: clients had to consult different energy providers separately on independent platforms.

approach.title: We unified everything into one intelligent platform
approach.description: To reverse this, a progressive web application was developed that unifies all providers in a single responsive interface and a CRM connected to the ERP was created.

impact.title: Real-time control transformed their business
impact.description: Now clients monitor production, consumption and savings in real time, receive personalized alerts, and the company reduces manual work and makes data-based decisions.

issues.noUnifiedPlatform: No unified platform for data consolidation
issues.noCrm: Absence of CRM for user and alert organization

toyota-canarias.title: Toyota Canarias
toyota-canarias.intro: We renewed Toyota's image by connecting with Gen Z and Millennials through an activation circuit with simulators and virtual reality, generating over 375K impressions and 4K qualified leads.
toyota-canarias.challenge: Need to renew image and connect with new audiences (Gen Z and Millennials) distant from traditional automotive marketing.
toyota-canarias.solution: We designed activation circuit with simulators and virtual reality at rallies and fairs, combining face-to-face actions with online community.
toyota-canarias.result: Circuit that exceeded 375,000 impressions, captured over 4,000 qualified leads and set foundation for expanded edition.

situation.title: Traditional marketing wasn't reaching new generations
situation.description: Toyota needed to renew its image and connect with new audiences (Gen Z and Millennials), away from traditional automotive marketing.

approach.title: We created immersive gaming experiences
approach.description: Galaga designed an activation circuit with simulators and virtual reality at rallies and fairs. The strategy combined on-site actions with an active online community.

impact.title: Gaming strategy delivered exceptional results
impact.description: The circuit exceeded 375,000 impressions, captured more than 4,000 qualified leads and laid the foundation for an expanded 2024 edition.

canarias-game-show.title: Canarias Game Show
canarias-game-show.intro: We positioned the Canary Islands as an international gaming hub by organizing a dual-venue fair with tournaments, influencers and interactive experiences that brought together 30,000 people and gained widespread media coverage.
canarias-game-show.challenge: Position Canarias as host of international video game event in market dominated by major European fairs.
canarias-game-show.solution: We organized dual-venue fair (Tenerife and Gran Canaria) with tournaments, exhibitions, influencers and interactive experiences.
canarias-game-show.result: Event that brought together 30,000 people, wide dissemination on networks and media, positioning Canarias as new gaming attraction hub.

situation.title: Canary Islands needed gaming industry recognition
situation.description: The main challenge was positioning the Canary Islands as host of an international video game event, in a market dominated by major European fairs.

approach.title: We created a dual-location gaming spectacular
approach.description: Galaga organized a fair at dual locations (Tenerife and Gran Canaria) with tournaments, exhibitions, influencers and interactive experiences.

impact.title: Canary Islands became a gaming destination
impact.description: The event brought together 30,000 people, had wide coverage on social networks and media, and positioned the Canary Islands as a new attraction pole for the gaming industry.

tlp-tenerife.title: TLP Tenerife
tlp-tenerife.intro: We relaunched the largest tech event in the Canary Islands after a two-year hiatus, designing a renewed edition with four specialized zones that exceeded 62,000 attendees and restored its prestige as a technological reference.
tlp-tenerife.challenge: After two years of pause, relaunching the largest tech event in the Canary Islands involved an organizational and trust challenge from both the public and sponsors.
tlp-tenerife.solution: We collaborated in the design and production of a renewed edition, with four specialized zones (LAN, Summer-Con, Innova and eSports).
tlp-tenerife.result: TLP exceeded 62,000 attendees, professionalized its proposal and returned to position itself as a key technology and gaming space.

situation.title: TLP needed to rebuild trust after two-year pause
situation.description: After two years of pause, relaunching the largest tech event in the Canary Islands posed an organizational challenge and confidence from the public and sponsors.

approach.description: Galaga collaborated in the design and production of a renewed edition, with four specialized zones (LAN, Summer-Con, Innova and eSports).

impact.title: TLP returned stronger than ever
impact.description: In 2024, TLP exceeded 62,000 attendees, professionalized its offering and repositioned itself as a key space for technology, gaming and training in the islands.

foro-canary-islands-games.title: Foro Canary Islands Games
foro-canary-islands-games.intro: We created the first institutional forum for the gaming sector in the Canary Islands, bringing together experts, institutions and local talent to establish a professional networking and reflection space for the video game industry.
foro-canary-islands-games.challenge: The video game sector in the Canary Islands lacked professional spaces for networking and reflection.
foro-canary-islands-games.solution: We created the first institutional forum of the sector, with active participation of companies, administration and local talent.
foro-canary-islands-games.result: Event that brought together experts, institutions and key agents, with high visibility and foundations for annual continuity.

situation.title: Gaming industry needed professional networking space
situation.description: The video game sector in the Canary Islands lacked professional spaces for networking and reflection. Galaga set out to create the first institutional forum for the sector.

approach.title: We created the first institutional gaming forum
approach.description: The event brought together experts, institutions and key agents, with presentations and debate tables on industry, employment and transversality.

impact.title: Forum established annual industry reference
impact.description: It was inaugurated by the President of the Government of the Canary Islands, had high visibility and laid the foundations for its continuity as an annual reference event.

alisios-live-gaming.intro: We transformed the Alisios shopping center into an interactive experience space during the Christmas campaign, connecting with young and family audiences through tournaments, VR and influencers during a three-day free event.
